snippet.title: Idle Craft | Steam | Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Unique blend of idle, clicker, merger, and alchemy! Craft various elements, unlock combos, and grow your island with charming hand-drawn art! Inspired by the core mechanics of Doodle God. Coming to Steam in 2025!

Wanna be first to know about game release? Wishlist Now!

Steam Page - https://store.steampowered.com/app/798470/Idle_Craft/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=officialtrailer

Discord - https://discord.gg/8fsjTNjQRF
